about.title: My main area of expertise is front-end development (client side of the website).
about.profile: My name is David BARTHELEMY, and I'm a front-end developer based near Metz, in Moselle (57). I've been involved in web development for several years now, first in parallel with my studies, then with openclassroom training. See all the projects I've worked on in the section:
about.moreAbout: HTML, CSS, JS, SASS, construction de petites et moyennes applications web avec React, fonctionnalités, animations, et codage de mises en page interactives. J'ai également quelques bases avec l'outil WordPress.

data.title: Applications
data.text: Integration of mock-ups and/or user connection options.

data.title: Optimisations
data.text: Optimization of a website to increase its performance, number of visitors and healthier code.

contact.text: Do you need a web developer? Do you want to launch a new project? You can contact me at the email address below:

1.description: Single-page restaurant presentation and exhibition site with a very sober design.

2.description: Single-page site, presenting and exhibiting a gaming/business training course related to this field.

3.description: Site bringing together the most important corners and all their assets, with a main page and a favorites system with redux.

4.description: Apartment booking site, with two main pages and several pages, one for each apartment.

5.description: Print it! website with a functional and automatic carousel.
